# purelymail_app_password (Ephemeral Resource)

Ephemeral app password for Purelymail. Creates a temporary app password that exists only for the duration of the Terraform operation.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Create an ephemeral app password for temporary access
ephemeral "purelymail_app_password" "temp" {
  user_handle = "alice@example.com"
  name        = "Temporary Terraform Access"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `user_handle` (String) The user handle (email address or username) for which to create the app password.

### Optional

- `name` (String) Optional name/description for the app password.

### Read-Only

- `app_password` (String, Sensitive) The generated app password (sensitive).
